tool_description: Delightful tool that provides an array of puns, wordplay, and clever jokes to add laughter and amusement to your applications, websites, or services. With this API, you can easily integrate a random joke generator into your projects, bringing smiles and entertainment to your users.
name: PunPal  - Random Joke Generator API
title: PunPal  - Random Joke Generator API

api_list.name: Random Joke
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://punpal-random-joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "punpal-random-joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://punpal-random-joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "punpal-random-joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
